Item.Review: The state it originally arrives in, this tablet is rather dull. It's kinda sluggish, pre-installed apps are rather bland, and the app market (AppsLib) is horribly limited. None of the regular Google apps one generally expects to see on an Android. What you need to do is visit ArcTablet Blog website. Thanks to excellent work by Bob White (a.k.a. 'Finless'), there is a new, custom firmware version available. The flashing process is a bit involved, but the instructions are very clear. Once flashed, you get a boost in internal storage, an overall snappier performance, faster WiFi, and most importantly - access to Google Android Market. In space of a couple hours, I had Google Maps with StreetView, Gmail with auto-sync(you need AnyCut app to access Account Sync settings) YouTube works ve ... ry well. Google Music, Pandora, Kindle - you name it. The screen is responsive and overall performance is pleasantly snappy. Screen is definitely not Gorilla glass like on my Droid 2, so you likely want a protector, and I recommend a hard case. I added a 16GB MicroSDHC card for extra storage. It would be nice to have bluetooth and/or GPS on this device, but considering the price, one can't really complain. The tablet features a full-size USB port that supports thumb drives, so chances are it could be made to support a bluetooth receiver or 3G/4G modem. Battery life is very decent, the device is lightweight, the screen is nice and bright. This device is no iPad or XOOM, but at less than half the price, and with custom firmware on, it definitely gives both a run for the money. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 18 out of 18 found this review helpful.

Item.Review: I rate the ARCHOS ARNOVA 10 G2 as the BEST budget priced tablet I have come across in the last 3 years. The touchscreen is very responsive, and as a media player, it is outstanding. For under $200.00, its is an excelent buy. I have no complaints about its performance.

I bought a couple of weeks ago for my wife as a b'day gift. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles but it's a good deal for the price. She's not too techical savvy,so it is perfect for her.It has all she needs and more. She has only had it for 2 days and so far the only con is the poor quality of the pictures from the camera.

Pros: size for the price
Cons: The camera is horrible!!!!
This is a really good tablet for the price!! I wanted a tablet that was cheap and one that do everything that the i-pad wud do. *pros-cheap,webcam,all your fav games like angry birds and more *cons- the camera is horrible u can barely see u have 2 go in the light but other than that its a really gud tablet.

I bought my 15 y/o daughter one for Christmas. She is very careful with electronics and not abusive. The case was loose on the corner and flexed and clicked when you picked it up. The charging port was loose after 2 months and then the wires in the cord broke as well. The screen wasn t very responsive either. The camera took pictures that looked like an old VGA camera took them. On the good side, the screen was crystal clear and the battery life was fantastic, when it charged. 6-10 hours for most of the time. I know its not an iPad, but I expected better quality from Archos. Would I buy another, no. The OS is Android 2.3 and there are cheaper tabs on the market with 3.0 and 4.0

Pros: Never got one to work
Cons: Short Battery Life
I bought this product as a X-Mas present for my husband. He opened it and use for two days. After that, the tablet would not take a charge. So, I returned it for another.On the second one, it would not light up nor take a charge. We thought it might be the charger so we bought a charger at [@] and tried the universal charger...and, the charger was not the problem...the tablet would not light up nor take a charge. Tried to call around for another to exchange it and not one Toys R Us store had any of these tablets in stock. After 1 month, tried to exchange again.On the third tablet, we opened it in the store and asked to plug it in - in front of the sales associate...which the third tablet would not light up nor take a c ... harge. My husband was so angry we said we wanted a full refund. Toys R Us at first wanted us to take a store credit. Once I piched a fit, the Manager finally gave us a credit on our credit card. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone!!! expand » « collapse

Pros: Easy To Customize
Cons: Freezes up
I purchased on 12/1/2011 for a Christmas gift for my teenage son. He unwrapped it and used if for one week. I shipped it back off on 1/13/2012 for repair. I went back to the store where I purchased it, but was told I would have to send back to the Mfc, at my expense of course. Still waiting on a new one. Needless to say, I am one angry bird. Bad investment - do your homework and pay the extra money to get quality merchandise. This is for the birds.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Review: Read arctablet blogs on how to add the Market without another firmware, it is very easy. This is my fourth Archos product, yes they are sometimes abit work, and but considering their price... don't hesitate and buy... I will go with 4 stars just because of the accessories availability.

Pretty good tablet easy to use! The only problem is that I tried to connect to Netflix and it won't let me!! Also.it's dificult to get a screen protector for it because the one's they sell out there are not the exact mesurments. Besides these things I'm very happy with it so far.

Cons: Unreliable Performance; Slow
At one point this tablet w3as priced at [$]? Why? Its not that much better than a low end tablet browser. Very dissapointed. The software in its AP library, that mimics of the more popular apps on the market barely owrk, if NOT AT ALL!!

Item.ReviewTitle: AWESOME CAME WITH ANGRY BIRDS ON IT!
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Screen; Lightweight; Durable Construction; Adequate Storage; Good Battery Life; Easy To Use; Reliable Performance; Fast
Dont really have any negatives. Quick response. Has everything the expensive tablet have at half the cost! My 13 and 11 year old love it! Already had Angry Birds loaded and other stuff. NO REGRETS!

Item.ReviewTitle: l am in love wt this tablet
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable Construction; Reliable Performance; Large Screen; Fast; Lightweight; Adequate Storage; Good Battery Life; Easy To Use
This is the best tablet ever!!!!!!!! I got this tablet for my 12yrs old and is just outstanding,very easy and simple to use...........to me far better than ipad.

Researched the comapny and this model and seems very promising. They are 2nd major market holder in France. This is their newest and most updated model. Sceen dpi is superb and the touch feature should be also. All in all the hardware included for this model should make it very very good for the price point. Just ordered so i will update this is few days after testing before gifting. Checkout was effortless, thanks Toys-R-Us for great website visit.

Pros: Large Screen
The screen is thin and the color is very vivid. It came loaded with the angry birds big plus since by 11 year old is definitely a fan. Before I wrapped it for christmas I decided to charge it and check it out. I am jealous now I need one. Browsing the net simple, everything so far seems great. I hope my son enjoys this tablet as much as I have or I might just have to take it. Why spend 500 when you can get this deal for [$] and free shipping If you are looking for a cheap tablet that your child will enjoy give this one a try.

Pros: Durable Construction; Adequate Storage; Easy To Use; Lightweight; Good Battery Life; Large Screen; Reliable Performance; Fast
I wanted a tablet for x-mas there so many of them now, it's hard to choose which one to buy. My husband reasrched each tablet and compared the Archos with the Kindle Fire, The Nook and the Nook Color,to name a few. OMG!!! This tablet does just as much if not more than the Name Brand Models...If you buy it on-line it is [$] However it's not marked in the store.. the store wasn't aware it was on-line for the [$].. After my huband showed them the on-line price the store honored the [$].. The price you just can't beat it!! I can't wait to play with it! It's worth it!!
Item.HelpfulCount: 3 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Review:
Pros: Lightweight; Large Screen; Reliable Performance; Easy To Use
I have only had this tablet for a couple of days to try it out before I decide to get it for my children for Christmas. So far so good! I am very unfamiliar with tablets all together but from reading reviews and talking to more experienced people, this tablet seem to be a great buy. I really love the 10.1 screen, the sensitivity works well, the sound, resolution, and speed are rather good. It was very easy to access the internet. When you take a picture it looks kind of weird at first but it clears up in seconds and looks pretty good. Over all it seems to be a great tablet. It does what it says it suppose to do and for a 9, 12 and 15 year old I think it would serve its purpose. At this time I would recommend ... this tablet but know it is a less expensive tablet so don't have expectations of an Ipad. Impressed! expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Review: I bought 2 as Christmas gifts for my young sons. They were very excited on Christmas morning, but the longer we ve used them and the more free games they download to them the slower and more problematic the units get. This is to be expected to an extent, but one of the units won t even boot up any more and I ve got to find time to do a factory reset. There are user groups dedicated to these Arnova units and I ve tried unsuccessfully to crack or upgrade one of them. It s been a while since my last attempt - perhaps it is time to try again.

First off, I could not get Google play to work. Secondly, could not download Archos Arnova firmware update. Lastly, there is no download app for Pandora or Netflix. What is the point of having a tablet if I can not get the issues noted above.

Its a internet tablet. If you like to browse and stream netflix and other streaming...its good. Cam is just ok. Music is awesome on the tablet as well as videos. I use it mostly for videos for ASL. It can get the full app. market. There are forms on youtube on how to do so...and it works well. So thats a plus.

Pros: Product was inexpensive
Cons: Short Battery Life; Freezes Up; Poorly Designed Keyboard; Slow
Its ok for just games.internet access is pretty slow but this tablet seems good for my seven year old.

The tablet has been purchased as a test loaner table computer to review files and dossiers in the unit. Once set up, it seems like it will provide a good insight into what our needs will be in the future, and/or to encourage members to go forward with their own. Though others may choose to upgrade to something more high end, this unit is perfect for our intent. The instructions are a bit to be desired in understanding the storage system and customizing for general use.

Pros: Operating System; Easy To Customize; Web Browsing; Screen; WiFi; Battery Life; App Availablity
There Has Absolutely Been No Complaints From The Time That This Item Was Purchased Until Now.

Pros: App Availablity; Operating System
We bought the tablet for our 10 year old daughter for Christmas. She treats it like an American Express card- she never leaves home without it. She has downloaded books, music, games, pictures you name it. She loves it.

Cons: Screen; App availabilty
This item wouldn't go into the android market so while it was still functioning properly you could only use the basics that come with it, within a couple days of use the product would turn off on its own or at times it was an issue to turn it off or on. Also had an issue with the pixels, a white line appeared on the side of the screen.

Pros: Lightweight; Large Screen; Adequate Storage
Cons: Slow
It is good,just very slow. It doesnt go to certain websites. Other than that its is ok. I really should of takin it back.

Pros: Easy To Use; Lightweight; Fast; Large Screen
Great product for the price comes packaged with more than expected - apps and technical capabilities
Going to buy another one

Pros: None
Cons: Slow; Poor Battery Life; Poor Software Bundle; Bad all round; Poor Speaker Quality; Crashes/Freezes; Unreliable Performance
Overheating,not charging,will not load apps, bad buy

I just brought this tablet two days ago. I LOVE IT. I use my sis ipad for basic stuff and this do the same. YEA YEA I know they are not equal, by I love this just as much. Worth the money. I gave 4 stars only because I can not find any screen protectors at this moment(I have to keep looking). I also can not download the square up app. : (

Pros: Easy To Use; Good Battery Life; Lightweight; Large Screen; Fast; Reliable Performance; The price
Cons: None so far
I was surprise how easy to work with,the large screen is more tnah perfect,and the price amaizing. Also the delivery was fast.

Cons: Slow; Poor Construction; Poor Software Bundle
Product but would spend more money for a better model
PRODUCT BROKE AFTER 3 WEEKS
Requires rooting to get all features but well worth it.
Love it. The only thing is that the screen is too fragile so don't sit on it it will brake.
Compared to all other tablets looked at & found this to be the best BANG for my buc !!!
